metadata.title: CVE-2022-45199 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
Pillow before 9.3.0 allows denial of service via SAMPLESPERPIXEL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45199` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 9.4.0-1.1build1
python3-pil.imagetk - 9.4.0-1.1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.4.0-1.1build1').
